title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler
author: oeyoews
name: Tiddlywiki Publish Tiddler
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/readme","text":"* Publish Tiddler Manager * not save storylist to html * support Publish or not manager !! NOTE * 需要手动启用FileSystem 文件 * 此插件重写 [[FileSystem Tid|$:/config/FileSystemPaths]] * 虽然此插件兼容单文件tiddlywiki, 但是只工作在nodejs tiddlywiki * maybe should use public is more understandable better publish * 在第一次启动时, 控制台可能会多出很多 `syncer-browser-tiddlyweb: Checking dirty status` 类似与这样的日志 !! TODO * use viewtoolbar replace template * add plugin work details with tiddlywiki * enable only dev * maybe should use stattiddler to use http * [[Source|https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw/tree/main/dev/plugins/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler]] * [[Demo|https://oeyoews.github.io/neotw/main]] "},"$:/config/FileSystemPaths":{"title":"$:/config/FileSystemPaths","text":"[is[system]removeprefix[$:/]] [publish[private]addprefix[subwiki/private/]] [tag[private]addprefix[subwiki/private/]] [tag[todo]addprefix[subwiki/todo/]] [tag[Project]addprefix[subwiki/Project/]] [tag[Journal]addprefix[subwiki/Journal/]] [tag[books]addprefix[subwiki/books/]] [prefix[neotw/]] "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/filter":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/filter","text":"[!is[system]] "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/icon/filter":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/icon/filter","text":" "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/icon/private":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/icon/private","text":" "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/icon","text":" "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/macro/publish-filter":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/macro/publish-filter","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\define publishFilter() -[[$:/StoryList]] -[all[tiddlers+shadows]!is[system]publish[no]] -[tag[private]] -[tag[todo]] -[tag[Journal]] -[tag[books]] \end "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/macro/publish":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/macro/publish","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":" \define opublish() <$checkbox tiddler=<> field="publish" checked=no unchecked=public> <$list filter={{{ [get[publish]match[no]] }}}> {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/icon}} <$list filter={{{ [get[publish]match[public]] }}}> {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/icon/filter}} <$list filter={{{ [get[publish]match[private]] }}}> {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/icon/private}} <$select field="publish" tiddler=<> tooltip='status' default="public"> \end \define pushishNotFilter() [get[publish]match[no]] \end \define pushishFilter() [get[publish]match[yes]] \end "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/publish-config":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/publish-config","text":"\define tidFilter() $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/filter
filter: <$edit-text tiddler=<> placeholder="[!is[system]]" tag="input" default="" />
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/style":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/style","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/ui/template":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/ui/template","","text":"<$list filter="[all[current]!is[system]!is[draft]subfilter{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/filter}]">
<> <>
"}}}
